import React from 'react' import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import Card from "react-bootstrap/Card"; function Products(props) { const {slug,name,image,description,price} = props return ( <> Card Title Some quick example text to build on the card title and make up the bulk of the card's content.
{name}
{product.description}
$ {price}
); } export default Products
